title: Jerry Seinfeld
description:
Kevin talks with comedy legend Jerry Seinfeld about Kevin’s appearance on “Comedians in Cars”, their shared love of Bernie Mac and Jerry’s new unannounced project. 

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (jerry seinfeld, kevin hart)
